# Food Web Dynamics

<br>

*	Testing food web theories and trophic cascade hypotheses: What is the relative importance of bottom-up and top-down forces in governing food web structure?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Interplay between bottom-up and top-down processes: Will simultaneous bottom-up and top-down processes counteract or augment each other?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Trophic downgrading and upgrading: How can trophic manipulations alter community processes and ecosystem functions such as primary productivity, nutrient cycling, and carbon storage?

<div style="height: 0.1em;"></div>

*	Interactions between food webs in different habitats: How may external resources such as spatial subsidies and allochthonous inputs induce trophic cascades in focal habitat?
